page.title: 10 Postal services in Keith
page.content: The main Keith Post Office is situated in Mid Street.In the front part of the building are the counters where customers may buy postage stamps or collect Family Allowance,Old Age Pension or use the Post Office Savings Bank.The P.O.also issues passports for people travelling abroad and licences for vehicles and dogs.The Keith P.O. delivers mail to Keith,Newmill,Dufftown Aultmore,Mulben,Drummuir,Grange, Glen Rinnes and Windyraw.There are 12 postmen including 2 women.They all wear a grey uniform and hat and each has a badge with a number.Each postman drives a red delivery van with a Crown and the words Royal Mail on the side.The mail arrives each morning around 6a.m. by lorry from Aberdeen and must be sorted in Keith before it is delivered locally.
